description: This file sets up an asynchronous agent to generate and print a horror story using the Perplexity model, with commented-out code for streaming responses.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent class responsible for managing model interactions and response streaming.

classes.name: RunResponseEvent
classes.description: Represents an event in the response stream from the agent.

classes.name: Perplexity
classes.description: A model class representing the Perplexity language model.

methods.name: agent.aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates and prints a response to a prompt.
